overview:
Today Online shopping is growing at a faster pace in India and people are more interested in buying new launches in all segments like Electronics, Home Appliances, Mobile, etc., Almost all leading brands are rapidly introducing their products in India to capture the highly potential Indian market. In parallel the number of internet users are growing steeply in India and people are much interested in reading the reviews, specifications and mainly the price before buying the product. In the competitive scenario, a team of personals have joined together to introduce www.pricemask.com PriceMask.com is Indiaâ€™s leading Price & Product comparison website, which projects the price of almost all products under different category. It is the first unbiased price comparison website in India. This website is accessed everyday by thousands of visitors across India to get a Right Product at Right Price. Here anyone can find Price, Specifications, Reviews, Discusstions on any products. Beside these features, we can also find some interesting features like SMS alerts, E-mail alerts. Newsletters, Wishlist, etc., PriceMask.com has lot of fans in social networking sites Facebook. Since the PriceMask.com network expands, there are lots of sellers approaches the website to display their products with extremely low prices, discounts and offering freebies. PriceMask.com has an exclusive News section in which people can find interesting news on Technology updates, product launch, competition between brands, etc., To conclude, www.PriceMask.com is a must portal which have already established itself among the wide range of visitors across India. Though exist for a long period of time, PriceMask.com is much younger and brings up new initiatives and innovative features for its visitors across India.

Pricemask is the leading website in all over india..we have 1000 of products specification,reviews,comparison and sharing,sms alerts,price drop alerts…
